verses.verse: Then <S%H376>some<s%> <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H5927>set<s%> up their <S%H1544>idols<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> and have <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5227>right<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> the <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> <S%H4383>block<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> Should I be <S%H1875>consulted<s%> by them at <S%H1875>all<s%>?

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them and <S%H559>tell<s%> them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H376>"Any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>sets<s%> up his <S%H1544>idols<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H7760>puts<s%> <S%H5227>right<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> the <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> <S%H4383>block<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and [then] <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H6030>brought<s%> to <S%H6030>give<s%> him an <S%H6030>answer<s%> in the matter in view of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1544>idols,<s%>

in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H8610>lay<s%> <S%H8610>hold<s%> of the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from Me through <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1544>idols.<s%> "'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H7725>"Repent<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

"For <S%H376>anyone<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> or of the <S%H1616>immigrants<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1481>stay<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5144>separates<s%> himself from Me, <S%H5927>sets<s%> up his <S%H1544>idols<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H7760>puts<s%> <S%H5227>right<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> the <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> <S%H4383>block<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and [then] <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Me for himself, I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H6030>brought<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> him in My own person.

"And I shall <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and I shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> My <S%H5971>people.<s%> So you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> is <S%H6601>prevailed<s%> upon to <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word,<s%> it is I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> who have <S%H6601>prevailed<s%> upon that <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> him from <S%H8432>among<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And they will <S%H5375>bear<s%> [the punishment of] their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> as the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1875>inquirer<s%> is, so the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> will be,

in <S%H4616>order<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H8582>stray<s%> from Me and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%> Thus they will be My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I shall be their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5002>"'declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>"
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> against Me by <S%H4603>committing<s%> <S%H4603>unfaithfulness,<s%> and I <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, <S%H7665>destroy<s%> its <S%H4294>supply<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> against it, and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from it both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast,<s%>

even [though] <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> and <S%H347>Job<s%> were in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> by their [own] <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> they could [only] <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>themselves,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

<S%H3863>"If<s%> I were to cause <S%H7451>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beasts<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they <S%H7921>depopulated<s%> it, and it <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> <S%H1097><s%> that <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H1097>one<s%> would <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> it <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H9130>beasts,<s%>

[though] <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> were in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "they could not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H518>either<s%> [their] <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> [their] <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> They <S%H905>alone<s%> would be <S%H5337>delivered,<s%> but the <S%H776>country<s%> would be <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>

<S%H176>"Or<s%> [if] I should <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on that <S%H776>country<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>country<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it,'

even [though] <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> were in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "they could not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> either [their] <S%H1121>sons<s%> or [their] <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> but they <S%H905>alone<s%> would be <S%H5337>delivered.<s%>

<S%H176>"Or<s%> [if] I should <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H1698>plague<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> that <S%H776>country<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> in <S%H1818>blood<s%> on it, to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it,

even [though] <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> and <S%H347>Job<s%> were in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "they could not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H518>either<s%> [their] <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> [their] <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> They would <S%H5337>deliver<s%> only <S%H5315>themselves<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%> "

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H637>"How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> My <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7451>severe<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H7458>famine,<s%> <S%H7451>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beasts,<s%> and <S%H1698>plague<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it!

"Yet, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H6413>survivors<s%> will be <S%H3498>left<s%> in it who will be <S%H3318>brought<s%> out, [both] <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they are going to <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to you and you will <S%H7200>see<s%> their <S%H1870>conduct<s%> and <S%H5949>actions;<s%> then you will be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> for the <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> upon it.

"Then they will <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> their <S%H1870>conduct<s%> and <S%H5949>actions,<s%> for you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have not <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> to it," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
